[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”What is a General Contractor?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

The general contractor, or GC, is responsible for the daily management of a project. Some of these responsibilities include directing specialized tradespeople such as electricians and plumbers, coordinating with material suppliers, and most importantly, communicating with the client. In the city of Los Angeles, a licensed general contractor is required for all proposals over $500. This regulation is in place to ensure the safety of homeowners and their investments.

At Joel & Co. Construction, the success of a project lies in the marriage of the client’s vision and the city’s approval of a compliant proposal. The company guarantees that the subcontractors involved and the in-house crew, follow best practice procedures and adhere to code requirements. The company is devoted to completing projects on time, within budget, and with an acute attention to detail resulting superior craftsmanship that everyone can see.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”A General Contractor You Can Trust” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction founder Joel Portillo was a young apprentice to both a concrete and framing specialist as well an electrician and plumbing contractor. He became a foreman for both specialties, learning the management skills needed to build a successful client-focused company while gaining hands-on experience. Knowing the importance of relationship to every tradesperson, it became his goal to build a company by establishing lasting relationships with experts he could count on. This has resulted in a legacy of satisfied clients and work that speaks for itself.

Simply because a contractor is licensed in Los Angeles not always mean that they are a general contractor you can trust. Joel & Co. has earned the reputation as exceptional contractors because the nuances of the construction process are understood and handled. Each project is approached with professionalism and clear communication is maintained throughout the process. The company not only meets the expectations of each client, but aims to exceed them.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”75″][vc_single_image image=”2059″ alignment=”center”][vc_separator][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_empty_space height=”50″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”Contact Our Team Today” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction is devoted to being considered the best licensed general contractor in Los Angeles, and is always looking forward to working with great people to make dreams a reality. Whether you’re looking for residential or commercial construction, the experienced team can handle the job. Learn more about the services the company offers, review the gallery of past projects. Contact the team today to discover why Joel & Co. is one of the fastest growing custom home builders in Southern California.

Joel & Co. is determined to be the best licensed general contractor in Los Angeles, and we look forward to working with you to make your dream a reality. Whether you’re looking for residential or commercial construction, our experienced team can handle the job. Learn more about our services, check out our portfolio, or contact us today to discover why we are one of the fastest growing custom home builders in Southern California.
